channel.title: Eco Reset
channel.description: Economy Reset is an option for most server's but i think it's unfair if theres only like 5 items going around that are supposed to be rare; so i was wondering if anyone could build an eco reset that is built to only whipe certain items from the game for instance; Create a code that has it only delete "####", "####", "####", (then you explain how to do it, and where the items go) This is due to some items on my server, and i'm just wondering if anyone can help me with it. :D thanks - Jack -

item.title: Eco Reset
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

Economy Reset is an option for most server’s but i think it’s unfair if theres only like 5 items going around that are supposed to be rare; so i was wondering if anyone could build an eco reset that is built to only whipe certain items from the game for instance; Create a code that has it only delete “####”, “####”, “####”, (then you explain how to do it, and where the items go) This is due to some items on my server, and i’m just wondering if anyone can help me with it. thanks - Jack -
